title: Northern Pines Apartments Huge 2 bedroom 2bath Coming soon!
posting_body: ['Northern Pines Apartments', '774 Northern Ave, Clarkston, GA 30021', '**COMING SOON***', 'Possibly As early as  October 2022!', 'Inside our apartment homes, we feature an all-electric apartment home, equipped with updated flooring, Black Appliances (in select unit), washer/dryer connections with a separate laundry room and walk in closets in both bedrooms.', 'We also offer 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, minutes from Northlake Mall, Stone Mountain Park, a variety of eateries, Shopping and Banking and yes, we are cable Ready.', 'There is a BBQ Grilling area and playground with Beautiful Landscaping and off street parking.', 'This huge two bedroom; two full bath is 1100 square feet.', 'Starting as low as $1,250.00 (includes water)', 'Application fee $50.00', 'with a $150.00 Reservation fee.', 'Our rental qualifications include making three times the amount of the monthly rent, passing a Criminal, credit, rental and employment background check!', '<URL>/', 'We are open from 9am-5pm on Mondays/Weds/Fridays of each week to service your needs.', 'show contact info', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', '*Some Restrictions May Apply and Prices are Subject to Change', '774 Northern Ave, Clarkston GA 30021']
